name: Star Chaser in Sea World
description:
Shoot all stars with one shot!

Do you like puzzle-action games with flashy visual effects?
If so, "Star chaser in sea world" is just fit for you.
How to play, set up the place of stars and states of gimmicks,
then shoot all stars with one shot.

DUALSHOCK 4 and Xbox One Controller are available.

Trailer BGM by "甘茶の音楽工房".
